Question: This person hosted Saturday Night Live with musical guest Carrie Underwood on March 24, 2007, his 31st birthday.
Hints: They trailed 17–7 in the 2nd quarter before this person found Dallas Clark for a 2-yard TD to end the half 17–14.

After seeking other opinions, this person had the second surgery on September 8.
